title: View Commits in a Specific Date Range (Challenge)
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to view commits in a specific date range using Git, which is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase.

meta.title: Mastering Git: Tracking Commits in Date Ranges
meta.description: Explore the power of Git's commit tracking features to uncover project history and debug issues.
meta.keywords: date range, version control, git labs, project management, git, commit, git playground

steps.title: View Commits in a Specific Date Range

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
